title: Cliffhanger
description:
This episode was formerly subscriber-only. Enjoy! This episode is one of only a few free episodes from Season 6. To hear all #Spooked episodes as they’re released, subscribe to Luminary directly, or to the Luminary Channel on Apple Podcasts.

Bill is home from college, on his way to meet his girlfriend, when his car swerves off the road…

Thank you, Bill Love, for sharing your story with us!

Produced by Annie Nguyen, original score by Leon Morimoto

Artwork by Teo Ducot

Season 6 - Episode 4
